participant_1.background:
I love to visit music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store.
I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I eat my feelings.
I want to be a good role model for my daughters.

participant_2.background:
I am a dentist who has a soft spot for my parents and sweets.
i do not celebrate any holidays.
My family are avid cyclists as well
i love my work and just got promoted.
i am in grad school.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you! I just got promoted at work! How about you?
That's great! Congratulations! I'm doing well, too. I just found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
That sounds amazing! I've never been hiking before, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to get some exercise.
I bet it is. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to cook. I like to grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
That sounds delicious! I love salmon.
I also like to read music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store.
That's interesting. What kind of music do you like?
I like a variety of music, but I mostly listen to indie rock and alternative rock.
I like those genres too! I also like pop music.
That's great! We should exchange music recommendations sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always looking for new music to listen to
